Let me be honest about JECRC fees:

B.Tech annual fees is ₹1,25,000. Yes, it's more than government colleges, but it's value for money. Why?

• Faculty is experienced, comes from industry
• Labs are modern with latest equipment
• Good placement record - average 4.5 LPA
• Top-class infrastructure

Payment options:

To be honest, this is an investment in your career. You'll recover this amount in your first job itself.

Admission के बारे में पूरी inside story बताता हूँ:

Eligibility:
• 12th में PCM से 75% चाहिए (SC/ST के लिए 65%)
• JEE Main या REAP का score चाहिए
• Age limit 25 साल है

Process step-by-step:
1. Online apply करो jecrc.edu पर (fee ₹1000)
2. Merit list आएगी JEE/REAP rank के हिसाब से
3. Counseling में जाना होगा, choice filling करनी होगी
4. Seat allot होने पर documents verify होंगे
5. Fee pay करके seat confirm करनी होगी

Documents ready रखना:
• 10th, 12th marksheets
• JEE/REAP scorecard
• Transfer certificate
• Character certificate
• Caste certificate (agar applicable hai)

Timing (2024):
• Applications: March-June
• Counseling: July-August
• Classes start: August end

Meri advice: Early apply karo, documents ready rakho, aur multiple choices daal dena counseling mein.
responses.en:
Let me give you the complete inside story about admission:

Eligibility:
• Need 75% in 12th with PCM (65% for SC/ST)
• JEE Main or REAP score required
• Age limit is 25 years

Step-by-step process:
1. Apply online at jecrc.edu (fee ₹1000)
2. Merit list will come based on JEE/REAP rank
3. You'll have to attend counseling and fill choices
4. After seat allotment, documents will be verified
5. Pay fee to confirm your seat

Keep documents ready:
• 10th, 12th marksheets
• JEE/REAP scorecard
• Transfer certificate
• Character certificate
• Caste certificate (if applicable)

Timing (2024):
• Applications: March-June
• Counseling: July-August
• Classes start: End of August

My advice: Apply early, keep documents ready, and fill multiple choices in counseling.

Courses के बारे में detailed बताता हूँ:

Engineering (B.Tech - 4 years):
• Computer Science Engineering (CSE) - सबसे popular, best placements
• Information Technology (IT) - CSE के similar, slightly different curriculum
• Electronics & Communication (ECE) - hardware+software mix
• Mechanical Engineering - core engineering, manufacturing focus
• Civil Engineering - construction, infrastructure
• Electrical Engineering - power systems, electrical machines

Other Courses:
• MBA (2 years) - management degree
• BBA (3 years) - business administration
• B.Com (3 years) - commerce background

My honest recommendation:
• अगर coding में interest है → CSE/IT choose करो
• Hardware+software दोनों पसंद है → ECE
• Core engineering और manufacturing → Mechanical
• Construction industry → Civil

CSE/IT में competition ज्यादा है but opportunities भी ज्यादा हैं। Mechanical/Civil में government jobs के chances अच्छे हैं।

Kya specific branch के बारे में जानना चाहते हो?

Exam system के बारे में complete details:

Exam Pattern:
• Mid-term exams: 30 marks (September & February)
• End-term exams: 70 marks (December & May)
• Practicals: 50 marks
• Total per subject: 150 marks
• Passing criteria: 40% minimum overall

Exam Format:
• Mix of MCQ और descriptive questions
• 3 hours duration
• Usually 8 questions आते हैं, 5 करने होते हैं
• No negative marking (relief!)

Result Process:
• Results 30 days में आ जाते हैं
• Online check कर सकते हो
• SMS alert भी आता है
• Physical marksheet college से लेनी होती है

Re-evaluation:
• 15 days के अंदर apply कर सकते हो
• ₹500 per subject fee
• 20 days में result
• अगर 10+ marks बढ़ जाते हैं तो fee refund

Tip: Mid-term को seriously लो, क्योंकि यह overall percentage में count होता है।
